title: PixelFont fits with Frutiger
content:
Hello,

I am searching for a nice pixelfont that fits good to frutiger.  
I ve tried verdana and standard from miniml there are quiet nice  
but maybe there are some other ideas around.

thanks for any hint :)

 [‹ How many is too many?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080629191346/http:/typophile.com/node/19172 "Go to previous forum topic") [need font for gravestone ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080629191346/http:/typophile.com/node/19169 "Go to next forum topic")
author: kalli

comments.content: Nothing will be better than Verdana. Unless you want something more narrow, then Tahoma.
